title: DJ SONA'S VOICE...
body:
Subtitles please. I'm sure there is some irony in there somewhere but oh well.

Also, will there be an easier way to map "/toggle" to something else. Would it not be easier to press a key rather than typing that out constantly?

replies.body:
Rito is still working on DJ Sona.

~~I really thought the Ultimate would be Zed...~~

RIP Zed mains

Zed mains are like Syndra mains.

Everyone else hates them.
Or you can change the settings and make it t/y/u

> [{quoted}](name=DianasGotSwag,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M6NKFM5E,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-04T09:51:54.654+0000)
>
> Subtitles please. I'm sure there is some irony in there somewhere but oh well.

"Hey guys,

I just wanted to jump in and comment on this. **We intended for her VO to not be** **understandable**. This VO change was made in order for the VO to not distract or interfere with her music. She has an obvious Daft punk/EDM feel and we wanted the VO to harmonize with that. 
The VO is also supposed to be heard with her music. I would hold off on final judgement until you get the whole experience. :D"

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/ELgn5vMa-issue-with-dj-sona-voiceover-very-hard-to-understand-with-additional-vo-filtering?comment=000f
You  can either do CTRL 5 Or /toggle

It takes like 1 second and a half to type that line........

Or even shorter.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=M6NKFM5E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-04T09:53:25.528+0000)
>
> It takes like 1 second and a half to type that line........
> 
> Or even shorter.

Wouldn't you rather press one button?
Dunno what button would work though, so I just think "oh well not the biggest hassle in the world" but if there is another more convenient option then yer I would use it.
agreed with the key maybe you could do /toggle map (key) the 1st time you use the skin
